name: Path of the Dead
description:
Description
Path of the Dead is a unique game in Voxel Art.
You have to arrange the car to escape this zombie-filled path, save the lost people in the city to help you in the tasks and still survive to waves of zombies.
Much more content and features are on the way! Changelog Beta V0.1.3 (05/11/2017)
- Optimize 3D art (Less triangles)
- Add New Stage on Horde mode(Police Station) - Add Stamina System (Run)
- Add New type of Zombie (3 variations)
- Add 2 variations of Basic Zombies
- Add Glow Effect
- Add Loading Screen
- Add Pause Menu
- Exchange medals icons - More Zombies - Bug Fixes
History : Here
